Title: Measures
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Cavell, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story editor), Ryan Farley (story editor), Jon Worley (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Dickie Bennett sets out to find the money Ellstin Limehouse stole from him, Robert Quarles takes a shot at Boyd Crowder's protection business, and Raylan has a run-in with a couple of hitmen from Detroit after Quarles threatens him.
